requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
